item.title: MoBu Script - Mirror Characterization
item.description:
Often in MotionBuilder I get a character whose pose needs some adjustments for it to be properly characterized.

Once I adjust one side, it’s always cumbersome to manually repeat everything on the other side.

So I scripted a simple tool, which gets the bones from the current character definition and mirrors it, be it left to right or right to left.

It’s just a simple script that I use on my workflow. I cannot assure it’s bug free, nor that it works on versions older than 2015. Suggestions and feedback are very welcome, though.

Download script.

Cheers!

item.title: MoBu Tips & Tricks - Mouse Capture
item.description:
In response to a friend’s request, I’m sharing a way for roughing in animation using the movement from your mouse or tablet in MotionBuilder.

Besides being helpful for the bouncing ball workflow I mentioned in my last post, having access to your mouse or tablet within MotionBuilder can be a useful resource for live performances.

I’ll soon be sharing a way to this in Maya!
